issues.title: Enhanced Logging System with Aesthetic Improvements

tasks.description: Create ASCII art logo banner for server startup
Add boxed configuration summary (port, modules, auth, GPU)
Implement ServerBanner module with consistent styling utilities
Implement custom FormatEvent trait for beautiful console output
Add level-based icons (✓ INFO, ⚠ WARN, ✕ ERROR)
Add progress bar for model loading/warmup phases
Create table formatter for multi-row data
Add --log-style CLI option (compact, pretty, verbose)
Ensure file logs remain clean (no ANSI codes)
Update documentation in docs/MOSHI_SERVER_SETUP.md
Set up benchmarking harness for inference latency
Profile CUDA kernel execution with nsys/nvprof
Benchmark disable_event_tracking() impact
Evaluate candle-flash-attn integration
Investigate CUDA graphs for inference loop
Implement CUDA memory pooling
Audit tensor .to_device() calls for unnecessary copies
Optimize pre-processing pipeline (overlap audio decoding)
Evaluate WebSocket compression (permessage-deflate)
Document baseline and improved metrics
